mnemonic: PAÍS = pa-ÍS - a PEACE-ful land is a country!
grammar_notes: Masculine. Accent on 'í' makes two syllables.
cultural_note: Portugal has strong national identity - 'orgulho no país' (country pride)!

mnemonic: PORTUGAL = por-tu-GAL - PORT of GAUL explorers!
cultural_note: Portugal was world's first global empire - 15th century discoveries!

mnemonic: PORTUGUÊS = por-tu-GESH - the language of PORT-wine land!
cultural_note: Portuguese is 6th most spoken language - 250+ million speakers worldwide!
Famous 'portuguesas': Amália Rodrigues (fado) Maria de Lourdes Pintasilgo (PM)!
Portugal and England have oldest alliance in world - since 1373!
Many Portuguese learn English - tourism and business important!
'Inglesa' also refers to English style - 'bifana à inglesa'!
Spain is Portugal's only neighbor - complex historical relationship!
Many Portuguese understand Spanish but don't speak it - similar but different!

mnemonic: FRANÇA = FRAN-sa - France with 'ç' for 's' sound!
cultural_note: France and Portugal have long cultural ties - many Portuguese work in France!
French was once language of Portuguese aristocracy - cultural influence!

mnemonic: ALEMANHA = a-le-MA-nya - land of the ALLEMANDS!
cultural_note: Germany is major trade partner - many Portuguese work in Deutschland!

mnemonic: ALEMÃO = a-le-MOWNG - nasal ending for German!
cultural_note: German tourists love Algarve - 'alemães' common in southern Portugal!
